title: rustc CLI panic on pipe

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

body:
I tried this code: ```bash rustc -C help | echo ``` I expected to see this happen: `echo` should pipe the help output to stdout. Instead, this happened (on stable and nightly): ``` thread 'main' panicked at 'failed printing to stdout: The pipe is being closed. (os error 232)', lib rary\std\src\io\stdio.rs:1193:9 error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic thread 'main' panicked at 'failed printing to stdout: The pipe is being closed. (os error 232)', lib rary\std\src\io\stdio.rs:1193:9 error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic thread panicked while processing panic. aborting. ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.56.0-nightly (ad981d58e 2021-08-08) binary: rustc commit-hash: ad981d58e1ca16bcf4072577934630deb11c5e14 commit-date: 2021-08-08 host: x86_64-pc-windows-msvc release: 1.56.0-nightly LLVM version: 12.0.1 ``` and ``` rustc 1.54.0 (a178d0322 2021-07-26) binary: rustc commit-hash: a178d0322ce20e33eac124758e837cbd80a6f633 commit-date: 2021-07-26 host: x86_64-pc-windows-msvc release: 1.54.0 LLVM version: 12.0.1 ```
BACKTRACE

``` thread 'main' panicked at 'failed printing to stdout: The pipe is being closed. (os error 232)', lib rary\std\src\io\stdio.rs:935:9 stack backtrace: 0: 0x7fffb421647f - ::fmt::hf141745c2b8f0ef6 1: 0x7fffb423f68a - core::fmt::write::h056df61b7bc8b831 2: 0x7fffb42099f8 - ::fmt::h528b029ec48da0bd 3: 0x7fffb421a646 - std::panicking::take_hook::hb978b114d2382491 4: 0x7fffb421a129 - std::panicking::take_hook::hb978b114d2382491 5: 0x7fff7b4f99e7 - rustc_driver::report_ice::ha158ba3684d6a28e 6: 0x7fffb421af40 - std::panicking::rust_panic_with_hook::h93d5982885e605de 7: 0x7fffb421aa01 - rust_begin_unwind 8: 0x7fffb4216dcf - ::fmt::hf141745c2b8f0ef6 9: 0x7fffb421a959 - rust_begin_unwind 10: 0x7fffb42723ec - std::panicking::begin_panic_fmt::h7c307d066c3b9e56 11: 0x7fffb4208291 - std::io::stdio::_print::h7ac888e2b0b9fc90 12: 0x7fff7b4f893b - rustc_driver::handle_options::ha327e2535327a5ef 13: 0x7fff7b4ef9c7 - rustc_driver::RunCompiler::run::h41f0251ecadc65ad 14: 0x7fff7b4ebf3e - ::fmt::h46216c0117803f26 15: 0x7fff7b4fb6fa - rustc_driver::main::he55654e9a1f96def 16: 0x7ff6dbe5104e - 17: 0x7ff6dbe51006 - 18: 0x7ff6dbe5101c - 19: 0x7fffb421b35a - std::rt::lang_start_internal::h076b7fab8d534464 20: 0x7ff6dbe51077 - 21: 0x7ff6dbe51284 - 22: 0x7fffe7cf7034 - BaseThreadInitThunk 23: 0x7fffe97e2651 - RtlUserThreadStart error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic thread 'main' panicked at 'failed printing to stdout: The pipe is being closed. (os error 232)', lib rary\std\src\io\stdio.rs:935:9 stack backtrace: 0: 0x7fffb421647f - ::fmt::hf141745c2b8f0ef6 1: 0x7fffb423f68a - core::fmt::write::h056df61b7bc8b831 2: 0x7fffb42099f8 - ::fmt::h528b029ec48da0bd 3: 0x7fffb421a646 - std::panicking::take_hook::hb978b114d2382491 4: 0x7fffb421a129 - std::panicking::take_hook::hb978b114d2382491 5: 0x7fff7b4f99e7 - rustc_driver::report_ice::ha158ba3684d6a28e 6: 0x7fffb421af40 - std::panicking::rust_panic_with_hook::h93d5982885e605de 7: 0x7fffb421aa01 - rust_begin_unwind 8: 0x7fffb4216dcf - ::fmt::hf141745c2b8f0ef6 9: 0x7fffb421a959 - rust_begin_unwind 10: 0x7fffb42723ec - std::panicking::begin_panic_fmt::h7c307d066c3b9e56 11: 0x7fffb4208291 - std::io::stdio::_print::h7ac888e2b0b9fc90 12: 0x7fff7b4f893b - rustc_driver::handle_options::ha327e2535327a5ef 13: 0x7fff7b4f9d55 - rustc_driver::report_ice::ha158ba3684d6a28e 14: 0x7fffb421af40 - std::panicking::rust_panic_with_hook::h93d5982885e605de 15: 0x7fffb421aa01 - rust_begin_unwind 16: 0x7fffb4216dcf - ::fmt::hf141745c2b8f0ef6 17: 0x7fffb421a959 - rust_begin_unwind 18: 0x7fffb42723ec - std::panicking::begin_panic_fmt::h7c307d066c3b9e56 19: 0x7fffb4208291 - std::io::stdio::_print::h7ac888e2b0b9fc90 20: 0x7fff7b4f893b - rustc_driver::handle_options::ha327e2535327a5ef 21: 0x7fff7b4ef9c7 - rustc_driver::RunCompiler::run::h41f0251ecadc65ad 22: 0x7fff7b4ebf3e - ::fmt::h46216c0117803f26 23: 0x7fff7b4fb6fa - rustc_driver::main::he55654e9a1f96def 24: 0x7ff6dbe5104e - 25: 0x7ff6dbe51006 - 26: 0x7ff6dbe5101c - 27: 0x7fffb421b35a - std::rt::lang_start_internal::h076b7fab8d534464 28: 0x7ff6dbe51077 - 29: 0x7ff6dbe51284 - 30: 0x7fffe7cf7034 - BaseThreadInitThunk 31: 0x7fffe97e2651 - RtlUserThreadStart error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic thread panicked while processing panic. aborting. ```
